definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: hoof (prob. orig. divided hoof; cf. Nö:ZA 1 (1886), 417, later of any hoof (v.

infr.), even Aram. of foot-sole of dove Targum:Onk Gn 8, 9, and of men (Je 47:3 +), cf. Nö:l.c.);—´[[פ]] abs. Ex 10:26 +; pl. [[ת]]([[וֹ]])[[פְּרָס]] De 14:6 Le 11:3; cstr. id. Is 5:23 +; sf. [[פַּרְסׂתַיִח]] Mic 4:13, [[פַּרְסֵיהֶן]] Zec 11:16; —
of ruminants Ex 10:26 (E; meton. for animal itself), Mic 4:13 (fig. of Zion), Ez Eze 32:13, Zec 11:16 (fig.); esp. [[שֶׁסַע]] ´[[פ]] ([[שְׁתֵּי]]) De 14:6 = Le 11:3, Le 11:7, and c. [[פָּרַס]]
of horses (not divided) Is 5:28, Ez Eze 26:11 (so Targum SyrVer ), Je 47:3.
